title: When Riot sends you a warning for something you posted on boards that violated the board rules....
body: At least TELL us what it is we said, I have no absolutely no flippin' clue what it is I need to stop saying...

replies.body:
ye

so we can learn from our mistakes

>
> ye
> 
> so we can learn from our mistakes

yeah, learn how to insult people so it's not against the rules.

> [{quoted}](name=Infected Walnut,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yvUcUfZk,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-08-19T02:42:57.764+0000)

> yeah, learn how to insult people so it's not against the rules.

this too
YES! I've had that come up 3 times and I've got no idea why...
Why would you want to learn from them? Just make a new account.
